M8G.DE.summary: Media and Games Invest plc operates in the digital media and gaming sectors in Europe, North and South America, and Australia. It operates through B2C/Game Publishing and B2B/Media and Platform Services segments. The company's portfolio of online and console games include casual games, role-play games, strategy games, and massively multiplayer online games (MMOGs). It provides approximately 30 MMOGs and 5,000 casual games. The company also offers B2B/media and platform services; mobile advertising and payment services; online video, social, and influencer marketing services for gaming companies; and programmatic and open market traffic marketing services. In addition, it owns and operates various game portals; manages YouTube channels for companies; supports YouTube stars and influencers, as well as designs and implements influencer campaigns; and operates online platform for the brand owners to set up their social marketing campaigns, book registered influencer, and analyses the impact and coverage of such influencer marketing activities. The company was formerly known as blockescence plc. Media and Games Invest plc is based in Valletta, Malta.
